SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Sinoso noyno kotowa noko gac?
Kowo soyo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_030.text:
I lack familiarity with
your tongue, creature.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Our apologies. Are you able
to understand us now?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_060.text: Ah, so you can speak a language I understand. And I see you are familiar with how to welcome visitors.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_070.text:
Be welcome in this land,
Soyay the Pollinator,
for we have summoned you.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_080.text:
You claim my presence
here is your doing?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_090.text:
Correct. By the power of the god
of we Imeru, we have summoned you,
the 40,846th Soyay the Pollinator,
to guide the Epuyke's maiden.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_091.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_091.text:
Correct. By the power of the god of we Imeru,
we have summoned you, Soyay the Pollinator,
to guide the Epuyke's maiden.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_100.text:
The Dismal King cares not for riddles!
Speak plain: what is an Epuyke?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_110.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_110.text:
The Epuyke is the blossom which gives life
to all that is in this world—and the maiden
is she who keeps the Epuyke alive. If the Epuyke does not blossom, all life
will wither and fade. To prevent this fate,
the maiden must cause it to bloom.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_120.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_120.text:
And it is you, the Soyay,
who guides the Epuyke's maiden.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_130.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_130.text:
Why do you entrust such an important role
to outsiders? You've no guarantee they will
see the task through—myself included.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_140.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_140.text:
All is as the god of the Imeru wills it.
This is part of the original promise made
between the god of the Imeru and Ancikar—
the evil which slumbers in the earth. But this is not something you need understand.
All that is asked of you is to guide the
Epuyke's maiden. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_150.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_150.text:
This 'evil which slumbers in
the earth' sounds intriguing,
but I'll not raise my hopes. Mostlike it's but a fictitious creation
of this 'god of the Imeru,' one invented
so they might appear more just.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_170.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_170.text:
Still, no place is entirely without darkness—
and since you have invited me here, I look
forward to seeing how much of it might be
found in the heart of this 'Epuyke's maiden.'

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_180.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_100_CUT_000_180.text:
Farewell to the both of you. I hope
to find something which captivates
my interest in this world of yours.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Mother_Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome! Welcome to Dura Village,
Soyay the Pollinator! We have been eagerly
awaiting your arrival. Please, come this way.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Clearly the Soyay is important to the people
of this world... See how they work to not put
the maiden's journey in jeopardy by upsetting
or offending whoever is chosen.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_040.text:
I am Lela, the Epuyke's maiden
for this season. I have been waiting for a Soyay to accompany
me through my trials, for it is said that
when maiden and Soyay overcome such together,
the Epuyke will endure.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Mother_Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_060.text:
The Epuyke ritual for the previous season has
already ended, and what time remains is short.
I apologize for having you set out so soon
after your arrival, but you must leave now.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Mother_Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_080.text:
Lela's mother—and I am delighted beyond
words that a maiden of Epuyke has been
chosen from my bloodline. Once Lela blooms into the Epuyke flower,
our family will at last be secure.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_090.text:
Mmm. So that is how the maiden
causes the Epuyke to bloom.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_100.text:
Correct. The Epuyke's maiden eventually
becomes the next Epuyke. Such is destiny.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_110.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_110.text:
And no one has an issue with their
children becoming vegetation?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_120.speaker: Mother_Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_120.text:
Certainly not! To become the Epuyke is
an indescribable honor that my family—
my daughter—has been chosen for.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_130.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_130.text:
I am surprised you seem so accepting of our
truths when you come from another world.
But the Epuyke will bloom soon, and I trust
you will understand all when you see it.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_140.speaker: Mother_Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_140.text:
Go forth now, Soyay, and cultivate
my daughter into a beautiful Epuyke.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_160.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_160.text:
We've no time to be idling about, Soyay.
Let us be off.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_170.speaker: Mother_Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_100_CUT_000_170.text:
May all luck be with you, Lela.
Go forth proudly for the sake
of our family and our lineage.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_000.text:
I look forward to traveling with you
and completing the trials, Soyay.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_010.text:
I sense little darkness from you or the
other people of this world. It makes me
wonder if I will find any who capture
my fascination in this place.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_020.text:
I do not know what you mean, Soyay.
In our world, we have only the god
of the Imeru, the god of the Kikir,
and the wicked god Ancikar. Does what you seek have anything
to do with our trials, perchance?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_030.text:
I seek the dark, and all who have beautiful
darkness within them. They are all waiting
for me to welcome them into my fold.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_040.text:
You meet the beauty condition splendidly,
yet lack darkness—and one without such can
never become my thrall. Instead, you must
become the Epuyke you are destined to be.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_050.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_050.text:
I tried to picture what my Soyay might be
like after I was chosen to be the maiden,
but you are far, far different from
anything I ever imagined. That said, I do not feel nervous.
It is all simply...strange.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_060.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_060.text:
But if the being you are searching for
happens to be Ancikar, it might prevent
me from blossoming into the Epuyke.
This would be a very sad thing.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_070.text:
Why do you desire to become
a flower to begin with?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_080.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_080.text:
The souls of all maidens who bloom into the
Epuyke live forever in the Maiden's Garden,
which is said to be a place of great joy. But I care not what sort of place
it might be; I care only that I will
finally see my Ahpe there again.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_100.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_100.text:
Ahpe is my only friend—one who is
undergoing preparations to bloom
into the Epuyke as we speak. The people claim she will no longer be Ahpe once
she becomes the Epuyke, but I do not believe this.
Ahpe will always be Ahpe—and when she blooms,
her soul will live on in the Maiden's Garden.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_110.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_110.text:
I have been alone since she left, and...
I miss her. So please guide me well,
that I might bloom into the Epuyke.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_120.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_000_120.text:
I will do just that. With the aid of the
Dismal King, you will become the most
lovely flower this world has ever seen.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_020_000.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_020_000.text:
Dreams of Ancikar—the evil who
slumbers deep within the earth—
have influenced this fiend.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_020_010.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_020_010.text:
Ancikar's dreams appear as fiends
during times of flood, but in times of
drought they appear as eggs instead. While we could easily crush the eggs,
none among us bother to do so,
for it is far simpler to just not travel
during times of flood.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_020_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_020_020.text:
Ancikar's fiends play an
important role, you see.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_000.text: An impressive plant. What is it?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_010.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_010.text:
That is the Epuyke, the great blossom
that brings our worlds together. And...it is also Ahpe. My friend.
She has been reborn as the Epuyke,
and will become a bloom of great beauty.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_020.text:
Are the Epuyke and the fiends connected
in some way? Because this plant appears
to absorb the darkness from them.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_030.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_030.text:
That is the job of Ancikar's fiends.
When a fiend dies, Ancikar's dreams—
which birthed said fiends—are absorbed
by the Epuyke. The Epuyke then takes Ancikar's dreams,
converts them to nutrients, and grows.
In this way are we kept safe from Ancikar.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_040.text:
Mmm. So the more fiends we defeat,
the larger the Epuyke will grow?
This is all very well thought out.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_050.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_050.text:
Yes. But if Ahpe's Epuyke grows too fast,
I will not be ready—for I must complete
my trials before it blossoms for Ahpe.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_060.text:
So the Soyay is effectively responsible
for both the maiden's trials and the
Epuyke's growth? What fun!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_070.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_070.text:
To think one would find the role of
a Soyay fun! You are indeed much
different than I imagined.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_080.text:
I regret I was not able to see all the Soyay
who came before me, for I am certain there
was fine darkness to witness therein.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_090.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DORA_110_CUT_030_090.text:
I could not say, for each Soyay has their
own way of thinking and doing. I ask only
that you guide me true along my trials.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
Welcome, Lela, Maiden of the Epuyke.
And you as well, Soyay the Pollinator.
I am the witness for the Trial of Strength.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
Have you come to understand the Epuyke's
maiden a little better now, Soyay?
Are you ready to fulfill your role?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
The Dismal King is ever ready.
Let the trials begin!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
It is unusual to see a Soyay so
eager to take on their role! But resolution is not enough to lead the
Epuyke's maiden—you also need strength.
I ask that you show this to me now.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
When your heart is truly close to the
Epuyke's maiden, only then will you
display your true strength as Soyay.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
You speak of the present Epuyke,
who I hear was once your friend.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
My apologies. I meant no offense. Ahpe's Soyay brilliantly overcame all
trials, which is why she bloomed into such
a healthy Epuyke. I only pray your Soyay
performs so admirably, Lela.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_0.text:
Tell me of this trial.
What must we do?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_1.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_1.text: You must locate a fiend and kill it— but a fiend that is not one of Ancikar's. You must find the fiend, Soyay. This is a part of your trial.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_1.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_1.text:
That is all? Pathetic. I was hoping for
a challenge worthy of my greatness.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_1.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_100_CUT_000_1.text:
Never have I seen a Soyay so arrogant!
But go then, Soyay the Pollinator,
and guide well our maiden of Epuyke.
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.text:
Is this truly the place, Soyay?
I see nothing here.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.text: It is. Of that, I am certain.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.text:
I am the summoner of the strength fiends—
and I am surprised the two of you
discovered me so quickly.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.text:
If I may ask a question, Summoner?
I understand why the Soyay must fight,
but what meaning does the act hold
for a maiden like myself?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.text:
Once you witness the Soyay fighting,
you will understand in due course.
Do you stand ready, Soyay?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_000_0.text:
Then I shall summon the fiend.
O great god of the Kikir, bring us
a mighty fiend from a world beyond!
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
We have found and defeated the fiend.
The trial is complete.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
I thought defeating fiends would make
the Epuyke grow. It appears unchanged.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
This fiend was not born from Ancikar's dreams,
but summoned by the god of the Kikir from a world
beyond—summoned with the same power the god
of the Imeru uses to call Soyay the Pollinator.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
We Kikir use this power to fight Ancikar's
dream creatures, and have lost warriors
beyond counting in our battle for this land.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
You have displayed the strength needed to draw
close to the Epuyke's maiden's heart, Soyay.
But tell me, Lela: what did you feel when you
witnessed the Soyay in battle?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
At first, I was afraid, my thoughts
dominated by what might happen
to me if the Soyay were to fail.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
But as I watched his desperate battle,
I found myself wishing for his victory—
not for my own sake, but because I simply
wanted to see him win. And when he finally proved victorious,
my heart overflowed with joy.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
I have been alone ever since Ahpe became
the Epuyke. But now, I am not; I can walk
forward proudly beside the Soyay.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_110_CUT_010_0.text:
Hear me, Lela, Maiden of the Epuyke:
I hereby deem you worthy to proceed
to the Trial of Love. I pray you will become our Epuyke, and ask
Soyay the Pollinator to guide you well.
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Hail, Lela, maiden of the Epuyke!
Hail, Soyay the Pollinator!
I stand ready to bear witness
to the Trial of Love.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_010.text:
We Kikir, fellow residents of this world,
offer the Trial of Love to judge if you are
worthy to become the next season's Epuyke.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_030.text:
You must plant vine seeds within
the holes upon the plateau.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Small fiends of Ancikar may appear.
Defeat them to fertilize the seeds.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_050.text:
If the maiden holds true love in her heart,
the seeds will immediately germinate
and grow into mighty vines.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_060.text:
And if they do not? Does this mean
I lack love and am not an appropriate
choice for the Epuyke's maiden?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Witness_of_Love

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_080.text:
You need fear nothing with
the Dismal King at your side.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_090.text:
While I leave the decision of where to plant
the seeds to you, bear in mind these vines
will help our people move from place to place.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_100.text:
How fine it will be to move between
plateaus without encountering fiends
during times of flood!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_140.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_140.text:
You need not strain your
mental faculties, Soyay.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_150.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_150.text:
We said, 'May the Epuyke blossom
be protected.'

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_160.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_100_CUT_000_160.text:
Again, I pray for your success in
this trial. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_000_000.text:
I assume this is one of the holes.
Will you plant the seeds here, maiden?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_000_010.text: Let us plant the seeds here.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_010_010.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_010_010.text:
Is my heart truly loving enough?
What if I fail?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_010_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_010_020.text:
Is that question directed at me? I suppose
I could answer, but it would be faster for
you to see the thing for yourself. Come.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_010_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_010_050.text:
With the seeds now in the ground,
we should expect a small fiend
of Ancikar's to emerge.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_020_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_020_000.text:
The seed has been granted nourishment.
We need only wait for it to sprout.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_030_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_030_000.text:
This marks the end of
the Trial of Love.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_030_010.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_030_010.text:
It seems I have love in my heart after all.
But answer me this, Soyay the Pollinator:
do you have a name?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_030_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_110_CUT_030_020.text:
I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.
But you may continue calling
me Soyay if it is easier.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Hail, Lela, maiden of the Epuyke!
Hail, Soyay the Pollinator!
I stand ready to bear witness
to the Trial of Wisdom.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_010.text:
In this trial, you must collect fragments of
the Epuyke Tablet which have been scattered
across the land, put them back together,
and decipher the tale written upon it.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Both tablet and tale are said to have been
created for the Epuyke's maiden by the god
of the Imeru—and to be the physical form
of Ancikar's dreams.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_030.text:
The maiden, upon blooming into the Epuyke,
is no longer a person. She becomes more
akin to a god—to a part of this earth. This trial is a test to see if
you possess the wisdom needed
to become a part of the earth.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Ahpe—I mean, the current Epuyke
collected these fragments as well,
did she not?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Ah, but she did more than simply collect
the fragments—she assembled the tablet,
deciphered the tale, and bloomed into
the Epuyke without being led astray. You have little time left,
Maiden Lela. Use it well.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_060.text: What form will this tablet take?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_070.text:
You already know the answer, Soyay.
Now go lead the maiden.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_100_CUT_000_080.text: Then let us find this tablet.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_100_CUT_000_000.text:
This must be a fragment of the Epuyke Tablet.
There is something carved into it—writing,
perhaps? I fear I'll not be able to decipher
this even when fully assembled...

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Your friend was able to do it.
I see no reason you cannot.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Yes, I suppose you're right. Regardless,
it's probably best to save such worries
until we have the tablet fully assembled.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_100_CUT_000_030.text:
I wonder who inscribed words
on it in the first place.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_110_CUT_000_000.text:
This is a fragment of
the Epuyke Tablet.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Do these fragments simply appear out of
the ground when a new maiden is chosen?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_110_CUT_000_020.text:
I am not certain; this is my first time
seeing them for myself.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_110_CUT_000_030.text:
You have not seen the tablets
of previous Epuyke?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_110_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_110_CUT_000_040.text:
Never. And now that I think on it,
I have never met another who has,
either. I wonder why that is.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_120_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_120_CUT_000_000.text:
This is a fragment of
the Epuyke Tablet.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_120_CUT_000_010.text:
It has a rather peculiar texture,
neither stone nor wood.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_120_CUT_000_020.text:
It feels the same as the
husks of our birth seeds.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_130_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_130_CUT_000_000.text: This should be the last fragment.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_130_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_130_CUT_000_010.text: I wonder what is written on them?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_130_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_130_CUT_000_020.text:
Ahpe read the tablet and became the Epuyke,
so the actual meaning matters very little.
I merely need to read it and bloom into
the Epuyke, as she did.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_130_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_130_CUT_000_030.text:
Let us return to the Witness to Wisdom
and assemble this as best we can.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_000_000.text:
Maiden Lela, you have collected
all the Epuyke Tablet fragments.
Now put them together, if you can.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_010_010.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_010_010.text:
Thus marks the end of the Trial of Wisdom.
Whether you choose to speak of the message
written on the tablet or keep it to yourself
is a decision made at your discretion.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_010_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_010_020.text:
How strange... I do not know this writing,
but when I put it together, I can read it.
I believe I am closer to the Epuyke now.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_010_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_010_030.text:
There is no need to rush your reading;
we've still time remaining to us.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_000.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_000.text:
Oh, but this is impossible! I am not meant
to be the Epuyke's maiden! I will never see
my beloved Ahpe again! I will be alone until
my foliage withers and—

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_010.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_010.text:
There have been other maidens who have been
unable to overcome every trial, Lela—but you
must not give up. All is according to the will
of the Imeru's god, after all.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_020.text:
The future you are lamenting has
not yet come to pass, maiden.
Do not be so quick to despair.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_060.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_999_060.text:
So be it, Lela, Maiden of the Epuyke.
So be it, Soyay the Pollinator.
All I can do now is pray you safely
finish the ritual. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_000.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_000.text:
I did it! I read it!
Now I can finally meet Ahpe!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_020.text:
It was from Ahpe—she's waiting for me at the
Maiden's Garden! She even wrote about a secret
only she and I know, so it HAS to be from her! Oh, but I am so happy! I'm going to bloom
into a beautiful Epuyke and see her again!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_030.text:
The tablets must be created by the
current Epuyke, then? Since you say
that is what Ahpe has become.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_050.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_050.text:
With its role fulfilled, the tablet crumbles
to dust so none but the maiden might know
its tale. Such is the will of the Imeru's god.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_060.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_020_060.text:
Hear me, Lela, Maiden of the Epuyke!
Hear me, Soyay the Pollinator!
I pray that you might safely finish
the Epuyke ritual. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_030_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_030_020.text:
It detailed all that has come to pass,
and all that is yet to come. Indeed,
I feel it is some manner of prophecy. But I also fear it might come across
in a negative way were I to speak of it,
so I think it best that I keep the
details to myself.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_030_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_110_CUT_030_030.text:
Then the Dismal King will
press you no further.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_000.text:
At last you have come, Lela,
next Maiden of the Epuyke. This season's Epuyke blossomed full and
beautiful. It absorbed the dreams of the
evil god Ancikar who slumbers underground,
then brilliantly returned to the earth.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_010.text:
We wish for you to bloom
just as beautifully.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_020.text: So Ahpe did it. She became the Epuyke.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Ahpe! It's me, Lela!
Can you see me!?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_040.text:
That is but the Epuyke, Lela.
The one who was called Ahpe is no more.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_050.text:
You need not heed their words, Lela.
You are the current maiden, and no one
knows the current Epuyke better than you.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_060.text:
I suggest you choose your words
more carefully, Soyay.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_070.text:
You are brave indeed to pick a fight with
your own divinity—or did you forget that
your god chose me for this role?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_090.text:
We are beginning the Epuyke festival.
The Epuyke's pollen will now rain down
upon the earth, and we grant you special
permission to acquire it for yourself.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_100_CUT_000_100.text:
Now go, before the Kikir
collect it all.

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Kikiris1
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_100_CUT_000_000.text:
The Epuyke bloomed again this season!
We're getting our pollen!

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Kikiris1
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_110_CUT_000_000.text:
Another season, another successful
Epuyke festival.

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_110_CUT_000_030.text:
I only hope I can get through
this without issue.

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_000.speaker: Kikiris1
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_000.text:
The Epuyke's pollen! Hooray!
We get our nutrients from this!

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: Kikiris2
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_010.text:
So tasty! Epuyke forever!
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_020.text:
I wonder if the evil deity Ancikar
truly does slumber underground.

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_030.text:
The only way to find out will
likely be for the Epuyke to die.

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_120_CUT_000_040.text:
Yes, I suppose the only ones who know for
certain are those in the Maiden's Garden.

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_000.speaker: Kikiris1
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_000.text:
Eee hee hee! Festival time!
Epuyke pollen time!

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_010.speaker: Kikiris2
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_010.text:
The Kikir LOVE Epuyke pollen!
Yummy yummy!

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_020.text:
The people of this world
consume pollen, then?

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_030.text:
Most do not. Though its form may have changed,
this pollen was once the dreams of evil Ancikar.
If ingested you will become unable to live without it,
just like these Kikir.

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_130_CUT_000_040.text:
They have been defiled by nightmares?
What pitiful beings.

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_140_CUT_000_020.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_140_CUT_000_020.text: Yes, I am in the middle of my trials.

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_140_CUT_000_030.speaker: Kikiris1
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_140_CUT_000_030.text:
Please bloom into a beautiful Epuyke
and feed us more delicious pollen.

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_150_CUT_000_010.speaker: Kikiris2
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_150_CUT_000_010.text:
Yummy, yummy! Such full tummy!
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_010.text:
There is little pollen left on the Epuyke.
All that remains is for it to wither,
decay, and become one with the earth.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_020.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_020.text: The Epuyke has little time remaining.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_030.text:
This means the ritual for the maiden
to bloom into the next Epuyke will
begin very soon.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_040.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_040.text:
We pray you might safely complete your
trials and blossom into an Epuyke that
rivals the one of this season.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_050.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_050.text:
Needless to say, I will do
all within my power.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_060.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_110_CUT_000_060.text:
You show promise, Maiden.
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Hail, Maiden Lela!
Hail, Soyay the Pollinator!
The time for the ritual has come.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_010.text:
The Epuyke has bloomed and withered.
Its soul has returned to the earth,
and now watches over and protects us.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_020.text:
And since the Epuyke absorbed Ancikar's
fell magic before it returned to the earth,
we now enjoy this brief moment of peace.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Alas, this is naught but a junction.
Maiden, the time has come for you
to be reborn anew into the Epuyke.
The time has come for the ritual.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: Lela
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Now I'll finally be able to meet
Ahpe again! Won't I, Siugnas!?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_090.text:
The maiden has been reborn
as the Epuyke's seed.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_100.text: So this is Lela's new form.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_110.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_000_110.text:
This is your final task, Soyay the Pollinator:
you must plant the Epuyke's seed in the earth.
Send it to Ancikar, that it might trap the wicked
god in slumber. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_000.text:
I will guide you to the end, Lela.
Now return to the earth.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_020.text:
You have borne witness to the Imeru's Epuyke
festival as the 40,846th Soyay the Pollinator.
I now pronounce you freed from your duty.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_030.text:
Then I choose to remain here and see
Lela's journey through to its end.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_040.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_040.text:
Half the Soyays remain to watch the Epuyke
bloom, while the other half run away as
if for their very lives. I see now which
manner of Soyay you are.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_050.text:
I promised to make her a more lovely
flower than any other, and the
Dismal King will brook no lies.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_060.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_060.text:
And yet, you are now merely a man.
We cannot stand here speaking to you,
for we must be off to greet the
40,847th Soyay the Pollinator.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_070.text:
The next maiden is already chosen?
Your god is a rather impatient one.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_080.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_080.text:
You are no longer Soyay the Pollinator.
Such matters do not concern you.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_090.text:
A pity. But if you've nothing
further to say to me, begone.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_100.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_010_100.text:
Epuyke nogonoa kowo to you,
the 40,846th Soyay the Pollinator!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_040.text:
You are the most beautiful flower the world
has ever seen. This is as expected, since you
had the Dismal King as your guide.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_060.text: Were you able to meet your friend?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_080.text: Mmm. She can hear me no longer.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_100_CUT_020_090.text:
When next we meet, I hope you might
enlighten me with fine stories of
the Maiden's Garden.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_END_POLLEN_100_CUT_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_END_POLLEN_100_CUT_000.text:
This must be her pollen. As your Soyay,
and pollinator, I will take some with me.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_010.text:
My name is Siugnas, and I come
in search of captivating darkness.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_030.text:
None summon the Dismal King.
I came of my own free will.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_050.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_050.text:
Pardon us. It seems none of what
we said got through to you.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, it did. You just refuse to
accept the truth before your eyes.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_090.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_090.text:
By the power of the god of we Imeru,
we have summoned you, the 80,136th
Soyay the Pollinator, to guide the
Epuyke's maiden.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_100.text:
Rarely have I met such stubbornness!
But so be it. For the moment,
the Dismal King will humor you.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_130.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_130.text:
You've none to blame but yourselves if
the maiden becomes tainted by darkness
as a result of her travels with me.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_150.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_150.text:
Very well. You should consider yourselves
honored that the Dismal King himself
will be serving as the maiden's guide.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_170.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_AREAIN_200_CUT_000_170.text:
I should start by meeting
this elusive maiden.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome to Doroso Village,
Soyay the Pollinator.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_010.text: You are the Maiden of the Epuyke?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_020.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_020.text:
No. I am Kup, younger sister to this
year's maiden, Chup. My sister—

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_030.text:
Her sister does not WANT to be
the stupid Maiden of the Epuyke,
thank you very much. Look, you're the Soyay, right? How about you
just get me out of here and take me back
to whatever world you came from?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_040.text:
Are you certain that is wise?
I hear the maiden holds the fate
of this world in her hands.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_050.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_050.text:
But we must have a maiden, Sister!
Elsewise the land will wither away!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_070.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_070.text:
I would love to, Sister—AND I'd do a
much better job than you! But I can't,
because the markings of the Imeru
are already on you.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_080.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_080.text:
This year's Epuyke is already budding!
If you don't do your part as the maiden,
we're all going to die!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_090.text:
Meh, who cares? If we die, all the
clerics in the city will just say,
'This, too, is fate!' or whatever.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_100.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_100.text:
Why are you ALWAYS like this, Chup!?
You run around doing whatever you want,
which means I have to behave like a
good girl because you NEVER do! IT'S NOT FAAAIR! WAAAAAAH!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_120.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_120.text:
Ugh. Fiiine. Whatever. I'll do it.
Sheesh! I just wanted to give her
a bit of a hard time, but then she
started crying and made it weird.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_130.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_130.text:
Come on then, Soyay.
Let's go do the trials.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_140.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_140.text:
Okay, Kup, I'm off to do the trials,
but I don't know if it'll go well—and
to be honest, I still had lots of things
I wanted to do in life. Happy now?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_160.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_160.text:
Does the guidance I must provide have
something to do with these trials?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_170.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_170.text:
Tradition says the Maiden of the Epuyke must
walk with the Soyay. As she does, she finds her
resolve to become the Epuyke by completing
trials of power, wisdom, and love.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_190.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_190.text:
Oh, that's something all Imeru know.
Sis is just...special.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_200.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_200.text:
Fear not, Kup. I will see that
your sister fulfills her purpose.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_210.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_210.text:
I'm Chup, and there's no need to be
so arrogant! I can see to my own
purpose just fine on my own, thanks.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_220.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_220.text:
Please, Sis! You have to formally
request the Soyay's help!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_230.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_000_230.text:
Fine, whatever. Please help me,
O great Soyay.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_000.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_000.text:
Man, no matter what argument we're
having, once she busts out the tears
it's my loss. It's always been like that,
ever since we were little.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_010.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_010.text:
And now, for some who-knows-why reason,
I'm this season's Maiden of the Epuyke
even though my earnest little sister
would be WAY better at it! Sucks for you having to be
the Soyay in my season.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_020.text:
On the contrary. I suspect I will have
more fun guiding you than I would her.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_030.text:
Hoo boy! Think I might be the one deserving
of sympathy for being stuck here with you!
Makes me even more glad that it's me
doing this instead of my little sis. I mean, not that any of it matters;
this Epuyke festival is probably
the last one anyway.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_040.text:
I assume that means this
world is about to end?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_050.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_050.text:
Probably? I don't really know the details;
it's the god of the Imeru who picks the
Maiden and the Soyay and all that. All I know is that I don't want to make
my sister cry again, so you better do
your damn job properly, mister!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_060.text:
So if you fail, her heart will likely
succumb to darkness? This is a most
tempting proposition, to be certain.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_070.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_DOROSO_200_CUT_010_070.text:
Ugh. Where did my life go so wrong?
Look, let's just get on with the trials.
I'm counting on you here, got it?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
Welcome, Chup, Maiden of the Epuyke.
And you as well, Soyay the Pollinator.
I am the witness for the Trial of Strength.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
Answer me, Maiden! Do you understand
why Soyay the Pollinator must now face
the Trial of Strength?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
Yeah, it's because I can't fight—but
I don't get why that means he has to.
I mean, all I have to do here is turn
into the Epuyke, right?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
In order to bloom into the Epuyke, you must
defeat Ancikar's fiends. If the current Epuyke
does not blossom, it means the next maiden
will never take her rightful place.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
Which means I'll stay the maiden forever
and never become the Epuyke...which I
wouldn't mind, if we're being honest.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
If the Epuyke does not blossom, we will never
receive its pollen. We Kikir toil day in and day
out so we might receive this gift, and it is the
duty of the maiden and Soyay to make it so!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
If you are finally done talking,
let us begin this trial.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text: You must locate a fiend and kill it— but a fiend that is not one of Ancikar's. You must find the fiend, Soyay. This is a part of your trial.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
Hmph. This will be over
in a mere instant.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_0.text:
Wow, someone's confident.
Hope that's justified.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_1.speaker: Witness_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_200_CUT_000_1.text:
And now, Soyay the Pollinator,
guide well the Maiden of the Epuyke!
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, we're at a big empty spot.
What do I do now?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.text: Here is the fiend we must defeat.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.text:
I am the summoner of the Fiend of Strength,
and am glad the two of you discovered me.
Now watch as I bring forth the fiend into
this world!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.text: Hey. Is this really going to be okay?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.text:
Stand back and watch.
I will see it done.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, Epuyke nogonoa kowo,
I guess?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_010_0.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_010_0.text:
I had thought a 'Trial of Strength' might
pose more of a challenge. That was barely
a warm-up for the Dismal King!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_010_0.speaker: Summoner_of_Strength
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_010_0.text:
You have done well in the Trial of Strength,
Maiden, and I pray you might bloom into a
beautiful Epuyke. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_010_0.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_STRENGTH_210_CUT_010_0.text:
Wait, is that really it?
I mean, uh, Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_000.text:
Hail, Chup, maiden of the Epuyke!
Hail, Soyay the Pollinator!
I stand ready to bear witness
to the Trial of Love. Your task is thus: take these
vine seeds and plant them in
the holes upon the plateaus.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_010.text:
Small fiends of Ancikar may appear—defeat them
to fertilize the seeds. If the maiden holds true
love in her heart, the seeds will immediately
germinate and grow into mighty vines.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_020.text:
So we're spreading vine seeds?
What's so romantic about that?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_030.text:
The vines that grow will aid you
and all the people. This is love.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_040.text: Yeaaah, sorry, but I don't really have love in my heart—and I absolutely don't want or need to help 'the people.'

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_060.text:
I just don't need this creep pushing a bunch
of stupid charity work on me when I'm already
busy trying not to make my sister cry!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_070.speaker: Witness_of_Love
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_070.text:
Take the seeds of the transport vines,
and know I will pray for you to safely
overcome your trial. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_080.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_200_CUT_000_080.text:
They clearly care not for
your desires or opinions.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_210_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_210_CUT_000_000.text:
I see a hole. Should we plant
the seeds here, maiden?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_210_CUT_010_000.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_210_CUT_010_000.text:
Look, let's just throw the seeds on the
ground and let 'em grow on their own.
That's what seeds do.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_210_CUT_010_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_210_CUT_010_010.text: Mmm. I hope you are correct.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_210_CUT_020_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_210_CUT_020_000.text:
That should be enough nutrition.
Now we need only wait for them to bud.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_210_CUT_030_000.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_210_CUT_030_000.text:
Am I one of these vines?
Or am I a fiend of Ancikar?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_210_CUT_030_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_LOVE_210_CUT_030_010.text: That is for you to consider, not I.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_000.text:
Hail, Chup, Maiden of the Epuyke!
Hail, Soyay the Pollinator!
I stand ready to bear witness
to the Trial of Wisdom.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_010.text:
Do you understand what this
trial entails, Maiden?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_020.text:
Um... You're gonna give me a test
to see how smart I am?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_030.text:
Our intelligence is nothing in comparison
to the god of the Imeru. No, the wisdom
asked of you here will determine if you
can reflect upon yourself.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_040.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_040.text:
I sense confusion in your mien,
so permit me to explain. In this trial, you must collect fragments of
the Epuyke Tablet which have been scattered
across the land, put them back together,
and decipher the tale written upon it.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_070.text:
And I can understand the tale
if I'm wise enough?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_080.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_080.text:
Precisely so—for only the Epuyke's
maiden can decipher the story.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_090.text:
So collecting fragments of a tablet
of unknown form is also a trial?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_100.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_100.text:
You already know the answer, Soyay,
for that is what it means to be you.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_130.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_200_CUT_000_130.text:
I always get tongue-tied saying this,
but...Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_000.text:
This is a fragment of the Epuyke Tablet,
but I have ZERO idea what it says.
...Does that mean I'm stupid?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_010.text:
No. You are simply too hasty in trying
to decipher the tablet's meaning before
you have collected all of its pieces.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_020.text:
Okay, whew! I was worried for
a hot second there. But CAN I put them together, though?
And can I even FIND all the fragments
since my Soyay is so...you?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_030.text:
You think me undependable? Heh.
Can that really be so when we have
already found a fragment?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_040.text:
Yeah, I'm sorry. I mean, my sister and I have
special memories of this place, but there's
no way you'd have known that. Honestly, the fact you even found it
probably proves you're a decent Soyay.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_050.text:
You've an emotional attachment
to this place, then?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_060.text:
Yeah, it was a popular place to search for
pretty rocks when we were kids—we used
to run around looking for these big, shiny
pieces of crystal. ...And whenever my sister found one,
I would take it and claim it for myself.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_070.text:
I really am a terrible person...
But I guess that doesn't matter now,
because my memories will all vanish
as soon as I become the Epuyke...

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_200_CUT_000_080.text:
Whoops! Man, listen to me!
Talking like my becoming the
Epuyke is guaranteed to happen.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_210_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_210_CUT_000_010.text:
Do these fragments simply appear out of
the ground when a new maiden is chosen?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_210_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_210_CUT_000_020.text:
I guess so? I mean, you never see them,
and it's not like anyone's come up and
shown me one either.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_210_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_210_CUT_000_040.text:
You seem awfully interested in these.
Wanna take one home as a souvenir?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_210_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_210_CUT_000_050.text:
...KIDDING! Ha ha, your face! Y'know, I come here by myself sometimes
to take in the view of the Epuyke.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_210_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_210_CUT_000_060.text:
I've always wondered what it feels like to
turn into the Epuyke, but I never thought
I'd...you know. Find out for myself?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_210_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_210_CUT_000_070.text:
And how does it feel to have become
the Maiden of the Epuyke?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_210_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_210_CUT_000_080.text:
I'm...not sure. But it's not like I don't feel
anything at all. I do. It's just that whatever
I'm feeling is really hard to explain.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_220_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_220_CUT_000_000.text:
And there's an Epuyke Tablet fragment.
They feel the exact same as the husks
of our birth seeds, so I can always tell.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_220_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_220_CUT_000_010.text: Your people are born from seeds?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_220_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_220_CUT_000_020.text:
Wait, are you NOT!?
Eeeeeew! Groooss!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_220_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_220_CUT_000_030.text:
...KIDDING! Yes, again.
Don't get all offended. You know, I wish you'd talk more about
yourself. Like, how you're born and
stuff like that? But I guess we don't
really have that kind of time, huh?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_220_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_220_CUT_000_040.text:
But, um, hey. If I do actually manage
to become the Epuyke, will you...
tell my sister about your world?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_220_CUT_000_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_220_CUT_000_050.text: I will give the idea some thought.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_230_CUT_000_010.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_230_CUT_000_010.text:
I wonder what is written on them?
We were told it involved reflecting
on yourself somehow.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_230_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_230_CUT_000_020.text:
What if it said, 'Ha ha! Just kidding!
You're not the maiden after all!'

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_230_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_TABLET_230_CUT_000_040.text:
There is no point thinking about such
things now. We should return to where
the witness waits.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_000_000.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_000_000.text:
Maiden Chup, you have collected
all the Epuyke Tablet fragments.
Now put them together, if you can.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_000_030.text:
Epi... Epa...? Uhhh...
Oh, right. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_010_010.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_010_010.text:
Thus marks the end of the Trial of Wisdom.
Whether you choose to speak of the message
written on the tablet or keep it to yourself
is a decision made at your discretion.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_010_030.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_010_030.text:
Of course. It is a revelation
meant for you alone.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_000.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_000.text:
I don't think I can do this...
I wasn't the Epuyke's maiden after all.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_010.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_010.text:
There have been other maidens who have been
unable to overcome every trial, Chup—but you
must not give up. All is according to the will
of the Imeru's god, after all.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_020.text:
Aw, man! I thought the maidens could
quit halfway through if they wanted,
but I guess not. Can't believe you're making me go through
this whole thing even though you know
how much I suck at it.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_030.text:
Your journey is not complete,
however much you may wish it.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_050.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_050.text: But you may surrender if you like.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_060.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_999_060.text:
So be it, Chup, Maiden of the Epuyke.
So be it, Soyay the Pollinator.
All I can do now is pray you safely
finish the ritual. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_020_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_020_020.text:
It was all about my little sister—about how
she's always loved me even though all I've
ever done is cause problems for our family.
...I think I understand now why I was chosen.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_020_050.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_020_050.text:
Hear me, Chup, Maiden of the Epuyke!
Hear me, Soyay the Pollinator!
I pray that you might safely finish
the Epuyke ritual. Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_030_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_030_020.text: It's a secret. One just for me.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_030_030.speaker: Witness_of_Wisdom
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_WISDOM_210_CUT_030_030.text:
The words of the tablet may remain
forever in your heart if you wish it.
My role is to witness, not to know.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_000.text:
Where would you go next, maiden?
Is there a particular destination
you have in...

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_010.text:
What is the matter,
Soyay the Pollinator?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_030.text:
So she has run. Well, it is not as
though this is unprecedented.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_040.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_040.text:
If we cannot find the maiden before the
Epuyke withers, we will have no choice
but to graft.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_060.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_060.text:
Grafting involves choosing a substitute
from the maiden's direct family and
casting the spell on them.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_070.text:
It seems becoming a maiden
is simpler than I thought.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_080.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_080.text:
Watch your words, Soyay. The maiden alone does
not face the trials: tens of thousands of times
have we repeated the ritual, and in that span
we have seen all manner of circumstances.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_090.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_090.text:
Very well. Now explain this
grafting process further.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_100.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_100.text:
We will cast the spell on the maiden's
little sister, Kup, and form her in a way
that is as close to Chup as possible.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_120.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_120.text:
I had been hoping the god of the Imeru might
choose Kup to begin with, for I feared exactly
this outcome. But alas, the ways of the divine
are mysterious, even to us.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_130.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_130.text:
She treasures her sister more than anything,
so I very much want her to know about this.
Oh, but I can hardly wait to see her reaction
to what is about to transpire!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_140.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_200_CUT_000_140.text:
We can wait only until the Epuyke withers.
If she does not return before then,
Kup must be grafted.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_210_CUT_000_040.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_210_CUT_000_040.text:
You must stay here, Kup. We cannot
risk your running off as well.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_210_CUT_000_050.speaker: Priestess of Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_210_CUT_000_050.text:
I trust you are familiar with the spell
of grafting? We are considering it as
a possible option.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_210_CUT_000_070.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_210_CUT_000_070.text:
You seem surprisingly calm, considering
the circumstances. I had expected you
to be rather more flustered.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_210_CUT_000_080.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_210_CUT_000_080.text:
No, it's all right. I'll be the maiden
if that's what Sis wants. But...

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_210_CUT_000_090.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_210_CUT_000_090.text:
But before I do, I have to talk to her.
Please, Soyay. Find her for me.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_210_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_210_CUT_000_100.text:
Such was my intent from the first.
How I look forward to seeing her
expression when she learns of this!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_210_CUT_000_110.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_210_CUT_000_110.text:
Make haste, Soyay the Pollinator, for
you have only until the Epuyke withers.
Epuyke nogonoa kowo!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_220_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_220_CUT_000_000.text:
Ugh, you found me ALREADY?
Seriously, what even are you?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_220_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_220_CUT_000_020.text:
I just wanted to be alone, okay? I wanted to
think about how I might look as the Epuyke,
and how the whole thing might...feel. And I was really close to an answer,
but then YOU showed up! Ugh!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_220_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_220_CUT_000_030.text:
Forgive my poor timing. You may think on
this to your heart's content—though you
will miss the sight of your sister being
grafted if you delay here overlong.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_220_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_220_CUT_000_060.text:
Regardless, we've another task
to deal with first.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_221_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_221_CUT_000_010.text:
I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sooorry!
Your dumb big sister took a little detour,
and now everybody's lost their damn minds.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_221_CUT_000_020.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_221_CUT_000_020.text:
Should the Epuyke vanish, Ancikar will begin
to awaken. You carry a great burden as the
Maiden of Epuyke, Chup—do you seek to have
this lifted from your shoulders?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_221_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_221_CUT_000_030.text:
Look, I wasn't running away, okay?
I just needed a little alone time. But I'm back now, so just leave
my sister out of this and let
me finish the stupid thing!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_221_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_221_CUT_000_060.text:
I got this, Kup. It's okay.
I'm your big sister, after all.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_230_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_230_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh. Hey, Soyay. Sorry for taking off,
but I just had this random thought. So remember how I told you about the
pretty rocks when we came here? Well,
I wanted to find a nice one for Kup.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_230_CUT_000_020.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_230_CUT_000_020.text:
I'm sure she will appreciate it
very much once the clerics
have finished grafting her.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_230_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_230_CUT_000_030.text:
What!? Oh, come on already!
Why doesn't anyone here TRUST me?
I mean, I was CHOSEN, remember!?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_230_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_230_CUT_000_040.text:
The clerics only believe in those who meet
their lofty ideals of what a servant of their god
should be. You do not do this, and they hold
a most intense dislike of you for it. If they think you are truly attempting
to abandon your trials, their fury will
doubtless lead them to begin the grafting
process then and there.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_230_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_230_CUT_000_050.text:
But I still haven't found the stone
I've been looking for! Will you help
me, Soyay? Please?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_230_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_230_CUT_000_060.text:
I will, for the Dismal King
respects this side of you.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_231_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_231_CUT_000_020.text:
You were carrying yourself with such
confidence as you walked over here,
so I kinda got my hopes up—but you
REALLY aren't a very good Soyay.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_231_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_231_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, whoa... This is so pretty...
But isn't it a piece of an Ancikar fiend?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_231_CUT_000_040.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_231_CUT_000_040.text:
Beauty does not equate to purity. 
Now let us take this memento
back to the village.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_232_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_232_CUT_000_040.text:
Hey, Kup. So remember how we used to collect
rocks and I'd always take whatever you found?
I know it was a long time ago, but I'm still sorry.
So...I got you this.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_232_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_232_CUT_000_060.text:
The Soyay helped me find it.
Pretty great, huh?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_232_CUT_000_070.speaker: Kupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_RUN_232_CUT_000_070.text:
Thank you, Sis.
I'll always treasure it.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_200_CUT_000_000.text:
At last you have come, Chup,
Maiden of the Epuyke. This season's Epuyke blossomed full and
beautiful. It absorbed the dreams of the
evil god Ancikar who slumbers underground,
then brilliantly returned to the earth.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_200_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_200_CUT_000_020.text:
I know. And if I'm going to bloom,
I'm going to be stunning—but I won't
be doing it for you.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_200_CUT_000_030.text:
So what was the name of
this season's Epuyke maiden?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_200_CUT_000_040.speaker: Priestess of Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_200_CUT_000_040.text:
The present Epuyke was once
an individual named Wakka.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_200_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_200_CUT_000_050.text:
So if I become the Epuyke, am I going
to be 'an individual once named Chup'?
Ugh. Can't say I feel good about that. Here's the deal: when I make the most
beautiful blossoms—and I am TOTALLY going
to make the most beautiful blossoms—
I want you to say 'Wooo! Chup rules!'

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_200_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_200_CUT_000_060.text: What manner of incantation is that?

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_200_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_200_CUT_000_070.text:
It was a JOKE! Don't take everything
so seriously, ugh. It's embarrassing.

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_200_CUT_000_010.text:
You make it sound like
it grew all on its own...

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_200_CUT_000_030.text: Let us quit this place, maiden.

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_210_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_210_CUT_000_020.text:
This was fun when I was a kid, but now
I realize I didn't get it at ALL.
You had times like that too, right?

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_220_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_220_CUT_000_020.text:
Boy, they're really going nuts...
I wonder if my pollen will taste
that good.

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_220_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_220_CUT_000_040.text:
You could at least TRY to sound interested!
But hey, what do you even eat anyway?
Is it pollen? Are you like these weirdos?

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_230_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_230_CUT_000_030.text:
If you eat the pollen,
you turn into a Kikir.

SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_240_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_GIMK_SIUG_POLLEN_240_CUT_000_020.text:
I'm in the middle of my
trial thingies.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_210_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_FLOWER_210_CUT_000_050.text:
I'll do what I can, okay?
That's all I can really promise.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_200_CUT_000_000.text:
Hail, Maiden Chup!
Hail, Soyay the Pollinator!
The time for the ritual has come.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_200_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_200_CUT_000_050.text:
Hey, know what I just realized, Soyay?
I never asked your real name.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_200_CUT_000_060.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_200_CUT_000_060.text: I am Siugnas, the Dismal King.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_200_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tyupu
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_200_CUT_000_070.text:
Bwaaaaaa ha ha ha ha!
Oh man, that name is HILARIOUS! Er, but thanks for everything,
Siugnas. Seriously.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_200_CUT_000_100.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_200_CUT_000_100.text: So this is Chup's new form.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_210_CUT_000_080.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_210_CUT_000_080.text:
No! Ancikar has possessed
the maiden's body!

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_210_CUT_010_000.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru R
SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_210_CUT_010_000.text:
As we suspected, maidens who run from their
trials are tainted; I fear Ancikar has crept into
the crevices of her heart.

SUB_W11_EVAR_SIUG_EPUIKE_210_CUT_010_020.speaker: Priestess_of_Imeru L
